name: ZANGEKI WARP
description: Take control of the hyperdimensional fighter craft ‘ZanFighter’ and use its advanced warp functions to defeat an army of space beasts controlled by an evil scientist!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 2000/XP/7 Processor: Intel Pentium3 1GHz or better Graphics: DirectX 8.1 or above and Direct3D with 64MB or more of VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible Sound Card
